TopicTitle: Video Wednesday: Little Ship, Big Adventure

Unlike an earlier attempt during which Bob was left stranded in deep space this mission goes off without a hitch. Very impressive! Of course, thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all in a dayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s work for Jebediah Kerman.<br/></p>
